english.segment1: These dry lips, they search for comfort. Will I settle for a quick rain or search for the source?. In the rain, life is beautiful.. I guess. I know there's more, I long for something deeper.
english.segment3: How deep and broad is this communion. Channel of amazing depth.
english.segment4: Water pulling under me. IÂ’m not moving, You move me. I'm ready for this current now. Take me to the river
